alert.note: Alert for Hillsdale (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 7:56PM EDT until March 31 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hillsdale County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 756 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Reading, or 8 miles southwest of Hillsdale, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hillsdale, Jonesville, Reading, Long Lake, Jerome, Somerset, Cambria, Pittsford, Moscow, Ransom, Camden, North Adams, Bear Lake, Lake Wilson, Frontier, Shadyside, Osseo and Somerset Center. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
